attributes.action: Reduce driving hours for bus drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Current law permits a bus driver to drive 5½ hours continuous with a maximum 10 hours driving per day. Coach and lorry drivers only drive for 4½ hours continuous with a maximum 9 hours driving per day. Bus companies are expecting their drivers to work the maximum hours permitted by law, which is resulting in tired bus drivers on the road. We would like to see driving time and break time to be brought into line with that of coach and lorry drivers with a maximum working week.
